page.title: 15Shopping in Johnstone
page.content: Johnstone streets are busy with shoppers on a Friday morning. We spoke to 26 members of the public and got many different opinions about the shops in Johnstone. These shops are used daily by very many shoppers. People come from{Houston, Linwood, {Bridge of Weir and Johnstone}itself to shop here. The majority of people thought that the range of shops was satisfactory, although some felt that more department stores were needed. Most people thought that the service in the shops was adequate, but some felt that the shops could cater more for old people. Only a minority of shoppers were unhappy about the hours of opening. The people of{Johnstone} appreciate their shopping facilities.
